00037 #include "egs_application.h"
00038 #include "egs_library.h"
00039 #include "egs_functions.h"

00045 #ifdef WIN32
00046     const char fs = 92;
00047 #else
00048     const char fs = '/';
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 typedef EGS_Application *(*createAppFunction)(int argc, char **argv);
00052 
00058 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00059 
00060     string app_name;
00061     if (!EGS_Application::getArgument(argc,argv,"-a","--application",app_name))
00062         egsFatal("\nUsage: %s -a application -p pegs_file [-i input_file] [-o output_file] "
00063                  "[-b] [-P number_of_parallel_jobs] [-j job_index]\n\n",argv[0]);
00064 
00065     string lib_dir;
00066     EGS_Application::checkEnvironmentVar(argc,argv,"-e","--egs-home","EGS_HOME",lib_dir);
00067     lib_dir += "bin";
00068     lib_dir += fs;
00069     lib_dir += CONFIG_NAME;
00070     lib_dir += fs;
00071 
00072     EGS_Library egs_lib(app_name.c_str(),lib_dir.c_str());
00073     if (!egs_lib.load()) egsFatal("\n%s: Failed to load the %s application library from %s\n\n",
00074                                       argv[0],app_name.c_str(),lib_dir.c_str());
00075 
00076 
00077     createAppFunction createApp = (createAppFunction) egs_lib.resolve("createApplication");
00078     if (!createApp) egsFatal("\n%s: Failed to resolve the address of the 'createApplication' function"
00079                                  " in the application library %s\n\n",argv[0],egs_lib.libraryFile());
00080 
00081     EGS_Application *app = createApp(argc,argv);
00082     if (!app) {
00083         egsFatal("\n%s: Failed to construct the application %s\n\n",argv[0],app_name.c_str());
00084     }
00085 
00086     int err = app->initSimulation();
00087     if (err) {
00088         return err;
00089     }
00090     err = app->runSimulation();
00091     if (err < 0) {
00092         return err;
00093     }
00094     err = app->finishSimulation();
00095 
00096     delete app;
00097 
00098     return err;
00099 
00100 }
